body: add an option that will automatically run the Download Images dialog in the background on start which will check for any new images and download them (in the background). Will need to check for a internet connection first.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: add option to automatically download new images on start.

comments.body:
Version 1.0 - On startup checks for new images using existing code and displays a message on the main menu screen if there are new downloads available. ( https://buildhive.cloudbees.com/job/melvinzhang/job/magarena/709/ )

**Status:** Accepted  
  **Labels:** Component-UI
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
I think the "new downloads" notification is sufficient to alert users to new downloads and if you download all unimplemented card images as well even the frequency of this alert will be much reduced.

**Status:** WontFix
